item.title: This Simple Trick Will Make You The Boomerang Paper Plane Master In No Time!
item.description: Introduction Have you ever wanted to become a master of paper planes? Well, here’s your chance! With this simple trick, you can become the boomerang paper plane master in no time! What is a Boomerang Paper Plane? A boomerang paper plane is a type of paper airplane that is designed to fly in a circular motion and then return to the thrower. It is unique in that it can fly in a curved path, and then return to the thrower.
